name: Paridhi Ꝏ Hoor
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: I know the things won't fall into place, but all will find their place and I'll be here to stay. ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText:
Remind yourself to breathe sometimes, I guess. 
Be present sometimes, and things are not going as bad as they seem. 
The sky is not falling, and there's no ship just for you,
 but there's always another ship to hop on and be yourself, I guess. 
  ✌️ Aayush (⁠◍⁠•⁠ᴗ⁠•⁠◍⁠)
replayText: And click, if you want to watch it again.
